alert.note: Alert for Desha (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 3:28PM CST until December 29 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DESHA COUNTY... At 327 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lucca Landing, or near Rohwer, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rohwer... Arkansas City... Lucca Landing... McArthur... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock.
